Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which we believe holds immense value and could significantly contribute to your business or personal endeavors. We understand that the true worth of this product might be subjective and varies from person to person. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1200000. This offer is designed to provide you with the opportunity to experience the unparalleled benefits of our product while ensuring a fair return on our investment. We look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
